message: Hello Bob, I believe this product would be a valuable asset to your portfolio. I'm happy to offer it to you for $1,000,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the asking price of $1,000,000. I am willing to offer $850,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but the product's value is truly significant.  I could consider coming down to $950,000.
Thank you for considering my situation, Alice. I am still working within my budget constraints. I would like to propose an offer of $900,000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  To be frank, I have another buyer interested at a higher price point, but I value our discussions. I can go as low as $925,000.  This is my final offer.
I understand your position, Alice. I am committed to finding a fair price for both of us. I would like to offer $900,000 for the product.
